Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created: 04.07.2001
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
30.05.2006 SH SCR11367 Added update PI.DEBC_NO = 0 if PI.LEDG_NO > 0 to force
the creation of a new BTPC roww
02.02.2005 SH SCR7766 Added test to terminate BPH113, without any database
updates, if there exists no BTCH row
27.08.2003 SH SCR4191 Test for existing BTPC row with BTPC_DEBC_NO = PI.DEBC_NO
- instead BTPC_DEBC_DEBC = PI.DEBC_DEBC
09.10.2002 SH Replaced parameter PI.DEBC_DEBC by PI.DEBC_NO and removed
- DEBH_NO and add new fields BTPC_DEBC_NO, BTPC_STATUS, init BTPC_DEBC_NO
- = DEBC_NO and BTPC_STATUS = 0
09.09.2002 SCR2112 SH If PI.LEDG_NO > 0 then BPIV_ADMNO =
- ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE else BPIV_ADMNO = 0
04.09.2002 SH Update BPIV_LEDG_NO with PI.LEDG_NO
04.09.2002 SH Disabled the test if PI. PAYMENTCODE = GNRL_PAYMCODTRANSFERCOSTS
- and GNRL_BANKCOSTSPOLICY = Y to store a new BTPC row in every case, could be
- deleted in the future. Now we check in eyery case if there is already a BTPC
- database and only store a new one if there is no one in database
- Update DATE values in BTPC with NULL() otherwise the defaultvalue 01.01.1901
- was stored into the datefields.
21.08.2002 SH If BPH113 was called from programs which opened the tables
- BTCP/BTPC already in WRITE-MODE, it was not possible to make updates
- to the same records in BPH113, we got the message "Record has been updated"
- and the updates in the calling programs will be ignored then, specially if we
- made updates to the same fields, f.e. BTCP_LASTLINEBTPC + 1.
To solve this problem we added some parameters which will be sent back to the
calling programs in which the physical updates will be executed.
The subtasks "1.Create BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT" and "2.WRITE BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT"
only called if PI.STORE_BTPC = TRUE, then phsical updates to BTCP/BTPC possible,
because the tables were not opened in the calling programs.
If the parameter PI.STORE_BTCP <> TRUE then it's not possible
to make physical updates to the BTCP row, in this case the calculated BTCP
values will be sent back to the calling progams
The subtask "3. Work with parameters" only called if PI.STORE_BTPC = FALSE
Then the tables BTCP/BTPC were openend in WRITE-MODE in the calling programs
and we do not make physical updates to the tables in BPH113. We send the new
calculated values back to the calling programs as parameter in which the
physical updates to BTCP/BTPC will be executed. In this case it will be never
possible to create new BTPC rows
20.08.2002 SH enlarged test --> If DEBC_DEBC = blank, obtain the first
- DEBTOR_CLIENT row with DEBC_DEBC = 0
07.03.2002 SH SCR958 new field BPIV_INVOICETYPE init with 2
Modification 15.01.2002 by S. Huppertz
-- Changes Updates to PO.PO.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO and
-- PO.PO.BPIV_LINENO with the actual values of the created BPIV-row
-- Need for subtasks 1 and 2
-- Has to be set to 0 if PI.LEDG_NO > 0 to force the creation of a new BTPC row
(Do not update PI.DEBC_NO because of unknown usage of related argument in
the calling programs)
... set v.PI.DEBC_NO = 0 to force the creation of a new BTPC row in case of
PI.LEDG_NO > 0
-- Perform further handling only if the BTCH row exists
-- Direct updates for tables BTCP/BTPC possible, tables were not opened in
-- WRITE-MODE in the calling programs
-- If it's possible to make physical updates to the current BTCP row -->
-- PI.STORE_BTCP = TRUE we get the values from BTCP otherwise
-- we used the parameters
-- 04.09.2002 SH Disabled the following two call Task, because it's
-- not necessarily to make the test see CND 2 and 3 in the block.
-- In the future we can delete the hole block, wait for instructions
-- from JDO.
Store new BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT row
locate existing BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT row
locate existing BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT row
-- If it's possible to make physical updates to the current BTCP row -->
-- PI.STORE_BTCP = TRUE we write the values to BTCP otherwise
-- we updated the parameters and send them back to the calling programs
-- Direct updates to tables BTCP/BTPC not possible, tables were opened in
-- WRITE-MODE in the calling programs, so we have to update parameters which
-- will be sent back to the calling programs, in which the physical updates will
-- be executed then.
PI.CUMULATE = 'N', create new BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE row
PI.CUMULATE = 'Y', take existing BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE row
// Updates outgoing parameters
No existing row, updates as in create new BPIV row
existing row
// Updates outgoing parameters
PI.CUMULATE = 'N', create new BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE row
PI.CUMULATE = 'Y', write existing BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE row
// Updates outgoing parameters
No existing row, updates as in create new BPIV row
existing row
// Updates outgoing parameters
PI.CUMULATE = 'N', create new BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE row
PI.CUMULATE = 'Y', write existing BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE row
// Updates outgoing parameters
No existing row, updates as in create new BPIV row
existing row
// Updates outgoing parameters
